title: Can UN shoot at unarmed civilians inside a Haiti Church and get away?
content: – by Shenali D Waduge – It was in May 2009 that the Sri Lankan armed forces eliminated the terrorist movement known for decades as the LTTE including its leadership. That achievement made Sri Lanka the only nation to have defeated terrorism militarily. That LTTE support-bases were infuriated at the denouement was no understatement…
